page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: In Midmar adults have to entertain themselves as there are no swimming pools, no cinemas, theatres, no community centres or sports complexes.They tend their gardens,visit friends, go shooting, fishing, play golf and some people go to play squash but they have to travel at least fifteen miles to the nearest centre (Aboyne or Alford.)Children also have to entertain themselves.They watch TV, play on their computers,they also play monopoly, card games or other board games.Some children have bicycles or motorbikes and there is plenty of room to play on them.We have a village hall and there is keepfit, discos, W.R.I and a Youth Club held in it.Senior Citizens also go there for meetings once a month.There is going to be an "Information Technology Centre"in Alford.
